narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Harmanjot Singh is a Non-emergency Medical Transport (VAN) provider based in Perris, CA. From 2023-04 through 2024-11, this provider received $505K in Medicaid payments across 6K claims serving 1K beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 1.6× the national median for T2005 (T2005), at $216 per claim vs. the median of $133, placing them above the 75th percentile.
Spending more than doubled from $93K in 2023 to $412K in 2024 (342% growth).
Saw a 4.4× spike in 2024 ($93K → $412K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
